name: todo-elm
description: TodoMVC using Elm - Demonstration for DevOpenSpace 2019

scripts.release: cp node_modules/todomvc-app-css/index.css ../Backend/Haskell/static/index.css && cp node_modules/todomvc-common/base.css ../Backend/Haskell/static/base.css && cp ports.js ../Backend/Haskell/static/ports.js && elm make ./src/Main.elm --optimize --output ../Backend/Haskell/static/todo.js

author: Moritz Großmann, Carsten König
